text: Moshi kare-ra ga somuki satte mo, ware wa kare-ra e no mihari hito to shite, anata o tsukawashita wakede wanai. Anata (no tsutome) wa,(keiji no) dentatsu dakedearu. Ningen wa ware ga megumi o aji wa seru to, sore ni yori koman ni naru. Tokoroga, jibun no te ga okashita okonai no tame ni fuko ni nayamasa reru to, hontoni onwowasureru
